creator: The Bloom Method / Studio Bloom
descriptionHtml:
The Bloom Method’s Studio Bloom fuses challenging, effective workouts with cutting-edge birth-prep workouts and post-natal healing techniques. Wherever you are on your motherhood journey, you’ll find classes tailored for you, whenever you need them—middle of the night or middle of the day, intense workout or gentle movement, and whether you have 45 minutes to workout or just 6—we’ve got you covered!

You’ll learn to connect with your breath, dive deep into your core, and believe in your own strength. This isn’t just a fitness program, it's a chance to learn more about your body and empower yourself with knowledge and strength!

These tools, techniques, and exercises are designed to empower your life as a mom, both before and after delivery, in your workouts as well as your daily activities. Learn how to avoid and heal diastasis recti, low back pain, pelvic pain, pelvic floor imbalances, and other pregnancy-related injuries while strengthening your body from your core. Recover quicker and stronger from birth and heal past pregnancy injuries with our series and support videos.

Feel confident in your strong mama body throughout pregnancy and into motherhood!

-100+ workout and educational videos to guide you along your motherhood journey
-Series, challenges and monthly calendars to keep you motivated and build strength safely
-Private support group access to ask questions of the Bloom coaches
-Stretch videos that will support and bring relief to your pregnant or postpartum body
-Nutrition information and recipes to keep you thriving through pregnancy and into your postpartum period.
-Meditations to help you find a little calm in your day


One Subscription. Everything you need.

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Studio Bloom on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your Google Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://studiobloom.thebloommethod.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://studiobloom.thebloommethod.com/privacy
descriptionShort: Redefining Prenatal & Postnatal Fitness

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improvements to the in-app purchase flow
- Improvements to the customer support flow
- Improvements to video playback
- Improvements to the Manage Subscription screen

- Added support for extended video metadata

- Fixed an issue affecting scrolling on certain Android mobile devices
- Fixed an issue with video playback when using Chromecast
- Fixed an issue affecting expandable descriptions

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Enhanced artwork support in featured carousel on TVs
- Improved error messaging for geo-blocked content
- Fixed issue where extras were not visible in certain contexts
- Performance enhancements and stability improvements

title: Studio Bloom

creator: The Bloom Method / Studio Bloom
descriptionHtml:
Studio Bloom is The Bloom Method’s virtual fitness studio packed with a variety of workout styles and evidence-based education to help you thrive during pre-conception, pregnancy, and postpartum. We use techniques that have been proven to prevent and heal abdominal separation while preparing you for your biggest marathon yet—birth.

Within Studio Bloom you will be supported on all levels of your motherhood journey including:
○ PREVENTION of pregnancy-related injures such as Diastasis Recti and incontinence.
○ HEALING + RESTRENGTHENING of your core and pelvic floor.
○ SWEATY + INTENTIONAL WORKOUTS that will meet you exactly where you are day to day.
○ TRAINING PROGRAMS designed to give you a roadmap to meet your fitness and recovery goals
○ YOGA CLASSES to keep you flowing through your asanas with added awareness to your core + pelvic floor.
○ MEDITATIONS created for mamas because #momlife we all deserve a few moments to reset.
○ NUTRITION and custom recipes by fertility and pre + postnatal nutritionist.
○ COMMUNITY SUPPORT inside our private online Bloom group.

NO EQUIPMENT? NO PROBLEM!
We have bodyweight-only classes. Plus any of our classes with equipment can be modified and done without equipment.

Join Studio Bloom today and get unlimited access to hundreds of on-demand classes for less than the cost of one fitness class!

-Already a member? Sign-In to access all the features and content.
-New? Subscribe in the app to get instant access to content and features.

Studio Bloom offers an auto-renewing Monthly Subscription. You'll receive unlimited access to content on all your devices. Payment is charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Pricing varies by location and is confirmed prior to purchase. Subscription automatically renews each month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings.
descriptionShort: Safe and sweaty workouts to keep you fit through pregnancy and recover faster!

descriptionShort: Safe and sweaty workouts to keep you fit through pregnancy and recover faster!
title: Studio Bloom

creator: The Bloom Method / Studio Bloom
descriptionHtml:
Take control of your motherhood fitness journey with the Bloom Method. Inside our online studio you’ll find hundreds of challenging and effective workouts on demand, that will have you safely working up a sweat at home. Rooted in evidence-based methodologies, Bloom’s programs are designed for fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum mamas. Our goal is to help you thrive during every stage of motherhood.

Bloom’s techniques are proven to help you get stronger through pregnancy, recover faster after birth, and heal past pregnancy injuries like Diastasis Recti. Join thousands of happy Bloom mamas and discover the power of our method. Inside Studio Bloom you’ll find:

WORKOUT VARIETY: Foundational techniques, our signature BirthPrep class for pregnant mamas, postnatal routines, core, cardio, HIIT, Boxing, Cycle, and strength classes that will have you working up a sweat!

EXPERT INSTRUCTION: Designed by a Prenatal and Postnatal Exercise Specialist (and mama herself!) and guided by experts, Bloom’s workouts will motivate, inspire, and guide you through one of the most powerful transformations of your life. You got this, mama!

INJURY PREVENTION & HEALING: Step into your power. Learn how to activate and move from your core, strengthen your pelvic floor, and breathe diaphragmatically to prevent and heal injuries during pregnancy and postpartum.

GUIDED TRAINING PROGRAMS: Exercise plans designed for fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum. Specifically tailored to remove the guesswork and help you reach your goals.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Become a part of our thriving community of thousands of mamas. Get access to the wisdom of our experts, plus fellow mamas who have experienced the struggles and joys of the motherhood fitness journey.

MEDITATION & YOGA: Flow through your asanas with integrated pregnancy modifications and added awareness to your core and pelvic floor. Reset your “mom brain” with a few minutes of mama-specific mindfulness.

NUTRITION: Custom recipes created by a fertility and pre + postnatal nutritionist curated for your motherhood needs.

STREAM ON YOUR FAVORITE DEVICES: Sweat at home or on the go: watch on your computer, phone, tablet, or cast to the big screen using Chromecast.

NO EQUIPMENT? NO PROBLEM! Get sweaty with one of our bodyweight-only classes. You can also modify many of our classes and get a good workout without weights.

Join Studio Bloom today and get unlimited access to hundreds of on-demand classes for less than the cost of one fitness class.

-Already a member? Sign-In to access all the features and content.
-New? Sign-up today.

Studio Bloom offers an auto-renewing Monthly Subscription. You'll receive unlimited access to content on all your devices. Payment is charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Pricing varies by location and is confirmed prior to purchase. Subscription automatically renews each month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings.

For more information see our:
-Terms of Service: https://thebloommethod.com/terms-service
-Privacy Policy: https://thebloommethod.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Safe and sweaty workouts to keep you fit through pregnancy and recover faster!

INJURY PREVENTION & HEALING: Step into your power. Learn how to activate and move from your core, strengthen your pelvic floor, and breathe diaphragmatically to prevent and heal injuries during pregnancy and postpartum.

GUIDED TRAINING PROGRAMS: Exercise plans designed for fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum. Specifically tailored to remove the guesswork and help you reach your goals.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Become a part of our thriving community of thousands of mamas. Get access to the wisdom of our experts, plus fellow mamas who have experienced the struggles and joys of the motherhood fitness journey.

MEDITATION & YOGA: Flow through your asanas with integrated pregnancy modifications and added awareness to your core and pelvic floor. Reset your “mom brain” with a few minutes of mama-specific mindfulness.

NUTRITION: Custom recipes created by a fertility and pre + postnatal nutritionist curated for your motherhood needs.

STREAM ON YOUR FAVORITE DEVICES: Sweat at home or on the go: watch on your computer, phone, tablet, or cast to the big screen using Chromecast.

NO EQUIPMENT? NO PROBLEM! Get sweaty with one of our bodyweight-only classes. You can also modify many of our classes and get a good workout without weights.

Join Studio Bloom today and get unlimited access to hundreds of on-demand classes for less than the cost of one fitness class.

-Already a member? Sign-In to access all the features and content.
-New? Sign-up today.

Studio Bloom offers an auto-renewing Monthly Subscription. You'll receive unlimited access to content on all your devices. Payment is charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Pricing varies by location and is confirmed prior to purchase. Subscription automatically renews each month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings.

For more information see our:
-Terms of Service: https://thebloommethod.com/terms-service
-Privacy Policy: https://thebloommethod.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Safe and sweaty workouts to keep you fit through pregnancy and recover faster!

NO EQUIPMENT? NO PROBLEM! Get sweaty with one of our bodyweight-only classes. You can also modify many of our classes and get a good workout without weights.

Join Studio Bloom today and get unlimited access to hundreds of on-demand classes for less than the cost of one fitness class.

-Already a member? Sign-In to access all the features and content.
-New? Sign-up today.

Studio Bloom offers an auto-renewing Monthly Subscription. You'll receive unlimited access to content on all your devices. Payment is charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Pricing varies by location and is confirmed prior to purchase. Subscription automatically renews each month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings.

For more information see our:

descriptionShort: Safe and sweaty workouts to keep you fit through pregnancy and recover faster!
title: Studio Bloom

creator: The Bloom Method / Studio Bloom
descriptionHtml:
Inside our app you'll find over 800 fitness classes, 20+ guided programs, and educational content that will bridge the gap between your movement practice, your pelvic floor pt, and everything in between! Rooted in evidence-based methodologies, Bloom’s programs are designed for fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum women. Our goal is to help you thrive during every stage of motherhood and beyond.

Bloom’s techniques are proven to help you get stronger through pregnancy, recover faster after birth, and heal pregnancy injuries like Diastasis Recti, incontinence, and prolapse.
Join thousands of happy Bloom mamas and discover the power of our method. Inside Studio Bloom you’ll find:

WORKOUT VARIETY: Foundational techniques, our signature BirthPrep class for pregnant mamas, postnatal routines, core, cardio, HIIT, Boxing, Cycle, and strength classes that will have you safely working up a sweat!

EXPERT INSTRUCTION: Designed by a Prenatal and Postnatal Exercise Specialist (and mama herself!) and guided by experts, Bloom’s workouts will motivate, inspire, and guide you through one of the most powerful transformations of your life.

COMPLEMENTARY 1:1 COACHING: We want you to thrive and we know that meeting you at an individual level will help you meet all of your goals and heal your body beyond your imagination. Each Studio Bloom membership comes w/ FREE individual support where you can connect to one of our expert coaches and get the personal attention you deserve.

INJURY PREVENTION & HEALING: Step into your power. Learn how to activate and move from your core, strengthen your pelvic floor, and breathe diaphragmatically to prevent and heal injuries during pregnancy and postpartum.

GUIDED TRAINING PROGRAMS: Exercise plans designed for fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum. Specifically tailored to remove the guesswork and help you reach your goals.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Become a part of our thriving community of thousands of mamas. Get access to the wisdom of our experts, plus fellow mamas who have experienced the struggles and joys of the motherhood fitness journey.

MEDITATION & YOGA: Flow through your asanas with integrated pregnancy modifications and added awareness to your core and pelvic floor. Reset your “mom brain” with a few minutes of mama-specific mindfulness.

STREAM ON YOUR FAVORITE DEVICES: Sweat at home or on the go: watch on your computer, phone, tablet, or cast to the big screen using Airplay or Chromecast.

NO EQUIPMENT? NO PROBLEM! Get sweaty with one of our bodyweight-only classes. You can also modify many of our classes and get a good workout without weights.

Join Studio Bloom today and get unlimited access to hundreds of on-demand classes for less than the cost of one fitness class.

creator: The Bloom Method / Studio Bloom
descriptionHtml:
Transform Your Fitness Journey with Studio Bloom: The Leading Pre + Postnatal Fitness App

Join over 100,000 moms and their birth teams worldwide who trust Studio Bloom to guide them through every stage of motherhood. Our expert-led workouts are designed with 25 years of combined experience, ensuring you receive safe, effective, and empowering fitness guidance.

Why Choose Studio Bloom?

Expert-Led Workouts
Benefit from our 25 years of combined expertise in pre and postnatal fitness. Our certified trainers design workouts that are safe and effective for every stage of motherhood.

Trusted Worldwide
Studio Bloom is trusted by over 100,000 moms and their birth teams across the globe. Our community is a testament to the effectiveness and reliability of our programs.

Extensive Workout Library
Access over 1,000 fitness classes and 25 guided programs tailored for all stages of motherhood. Whether you're pregnant, newly postpartum, or beyond, we have the right workout for you.

Complimentary Individual Coaching
All members receive personalized coaching to help you reach your fitness goals. Our expert coaches provide tailored advice and support, ensuring you stay on track.

Nutrition Guides
Complement your fitness routine with our comprehensive nutrition guides, designed for each phase of motherhood. Fuel your body with the right nutrients to support your fitness journey and overall well-being.

Pioneers in Pre + Postnatal Fitness
As pioneers in the pre and postnatal fitness space, we are committed to providing the most up-to-date and effective fitness solutions for moms. Our innovative approach and dedication to maternal health set us apart.

Key Features:
* Apple Watch Integration: Monitor your heart rate and calories burned during workouts.
* Bodyweight-Only Classes: No equipment? No problem! Enjoy effective workouts without any gear.
* Stream Anywhere: Access workouts on your phone, tablet, or TV.
* Educational Content: Learn from the experts with our in-depth content on pelvic floor health, core strength, and more.

Get Started Today!
Download Studio Bloom and start your fitness journey with the leading pre + postnatal fitness app. Sign up now and experience the benefits of expert guidance, personalized coaching, and a supportive community.

Subscription Details:
Studio Bloom offers an auto-renewing monthly subscription for unlimited access to all features and content. Payment is charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Manage your subscription in account settings. Prices vary by location.

Join the Studio Bloom Community
For more information, visit our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

What’s New
Stay updated with our latest improvements and bug fixes to ensure you have the best experience.
